data.text: There's two kinds of theft, loosely speaking. Opportunist and professional. Most decent locks will deter the opportunist, the sort of theft when someone sees you lean your bike against a fence and disappear into a supermarket. Pretty much no lock will deter or even delay a professional, so a lock is all about satisfying your insurance company requirements to cover the bike. I carry and use a sold secure gold D lock as that's what my insurance company require.
